radiographic_examinations.date: Hospital day 5 (twelve days before current admission)
radiographic_examinations.findings: Subtle hyperintensity in the occipital sulci bilaterally; subtle enhancement in some occipital sulci; non-specific hyperintense focus in the right corona radiata; no evidence of acute ischemia, intracranial hemorrhage, or mass lesion.
No evidence of brain swelling, edema, ischemia, hemorrhage, or other acute intracranial abnormalities.
